page.title: 07FARMING 3
page.content: These animals plus 150 or more calves are grazed on 350 acres of which 200 are rotation grass and 150permanent pasture.Grazing is only possible on the rotation grass after ithas been cut for winter fodder.In addition to rotation grass 450 acres are cultivated:the crops grown are barley,wheat and oilseed rape - 150 acres of each.Unlike Broomhill 80% of the crops are sold for procesing:only 20% is kept for winter feed. Winter feed for the animals consists of cereals,grass in the form of hay,silage or haylage and concentrates. Oilseed rape is the only new crop. it has been introduced in the last 5 years and is used as abreak crop - as an alternative to grass after cereals. it is also an attractive cashcrop,while like clover it can add
